channel.title: 美女子在超市中舔过冰淇淋后将其放回冷柜
channel.description: 美女子在超市中舔过冰淇淋后将其放回冷柜

item.title: 美女子在超市中舔过冰淇淋后将其放回冷柜[0-50]
item.description:
美女子在超市中舔过冰淇淋后将其放回冷柜 https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2019/07/01/blue-bell-viral-video-woman-licking-ice-cream/1624579001/
A video of a woman appearing to lick a tub of Blue Bell ice cream before putting it back in a grocery store freezer has attracted the attention of millions, including Blue Bell Creameries.
一个旅人舔了一桶蓝铃Tin Roof口味（实在不知道该怎么翻）冰淇淋，然后将其放回超市冷柜的视频引起了数百万人的注意，其中包括冰淇淋的生产商蓝铃乳业（这是美国三大冰淇淋生产商之一，总部位于得克萨斯州）
The video was posted Saturday by user "Optimus Primal," with the caption, "What kinda psychopathic behavior is this?!" has been viewed more than 10 million times as of Monday evening. It's been retweeted more than 25,000 times and liked more than 61,000 times.
该视频于星期六由推特用户“黑猩猩队长”发布，视频标题是“这TMD是什么深井冰行为？”，该视频于星期一晚上已经被观看过1000万次，获得了2万5000次转推和6万1000次点赞。
Blue Bell Creameries said it is "monitoring the situation" and cooperating with law enforcement.
蓝铃乳业称将“持续关注此事”并将与执法部门合作。
"This type of incident will not be tolerated," the Texas company said in a statement.
“我们绝不容忍这种行为”Blue Bell Creameries在声明中写道。
//相关视频：https://twitter.com/BlindDensetsu/status/1144954255318671366
Some people on Twitter have called for the woman's arrest
一些推特用户呼吁逮捕这名旅人
Others were wondering why the ice cream wasn't sealed
另一些则质疑为什么冰淇淋没有塑封。
Blue Bell Creameries had a response to that in its statement: "During production, our half gallons are flipped upside down and sent to a hardening room where the ice cream freezes to the lid creating a natural seal," the company said. "The lids are frozen tightly to the carton. Any attempt at opening the product should be noticeable."
蓝铃乳业在声明中回应了这一质疑“在生产过程中，我们的半加仑桶装冰淇淋会被翻转过来送去冷冻室，冰淇淋会被紧紧地冻在盖子上，形成一个天然封印。大家可以很容易地察觉盖子有没有被打开过。“
It's unclear from the video if the woman left the grocery store after licking the Tin Roof-flavored ice cream or where the video was taken.
目前暂时还不清楚这名旅人是不是舔过就回家了，也不知道视频是何时何地拍摄。
item.content:encoded:
东非大裂谷:
美女子在超市中舔过冰淇淋后将其放回冷柜
https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2019/07/01/blue-bell-viral-video-woman-licking-ice-cream/1624579001/
A video of a woman appearing to lick a tub of Blue Bell ice cream before putting it back in a grocery store freezer has attracted the attention of millions, including Blue Bell Creameries.
一个旅人舔了一桶蓝铃Tin Roof口味（实在不知道该怎么翻）冰淇淋，然后将其放回超市冷柜的视频引起了数百万人的注意，其中包括冰淇淋的生产商蓝铃乳业（这是美国三大冰淇淋生产商之一，总部位于得克萨斯州）
The video was posted Saturday by user "Optimus Primal," with the caption, "What kinda psychopathic behavior is this?!" has been viewed more than 10 million times as of Monday evening. It's been retweeted more than 25,000 times and liked more than 61,000 times.
该视频于星期六由推特用户“黑猩猩队长”发布，视频标题是“这TMD是什么深井冰行为？”，该视频于星期一晚上已经被观看过1000万次，获得了2万5000次转推和6万1000次点赞。
Blue Bell Creameries said it is "monitoring the situation" and cooperating with law enforcement.
蓝铃乳业称将“持续关注此事”并将与执法部门合作。
"This type of incident will not be tolerated," the Texas company said in a statement.
“我们绝不容忍这种行为”Blue Bell Creameries在声明中写道。
//相关视频：https://twitter.com/BlindDensetsu/status/1144954255318671366
Some people on Twitter have called for the woman's arrest
一些推特用户呼吁逮捕这名旅人
Others were wondering why the ice cream wasn't sealed
另一些则质疑为什么冰淇淋没有塑封。
Blue Bell Creameries had a response to that in its statement: "During production, our half gallons are flipped upside down and sent to a hardening room where the ice cream freezes to the lid creating a natural seal," the company said. "The lids are frozen tightly to the carton. Any attempt at opening the product should be noticeable."
蓝铃乳业在声明中回应了这一质疑“在生产过程中，我们的半加仑桶装冰淇淋会被翻转过来送去冷冻室，冰淇淋会被紧紧地冻在盖子上，形成一个天然封印。大家可以很容易地察觉盖子有没有被打开过。“
It's unclear from the video if the woman left the grocery store after licking the Tin Roof-flavored ice cream or where the video was taken.
目前暂时还不清楚这名旅人是不是舔过就回家了，也不知道视频是何时何地拍摄。

东非大裂谷:
https://thehill.com/blogs/blog-briefing-room/news/451687-woman-seen-licking-ice-cream-tub-in-walmart-could-face-a-20
https://www.gannett-cdn.com/presto/2019/07/04/USAT/cf6652db-3471-48b7-b384-6fea2ecc3345-65667348_2565431046801926_1751949380883054592_o.jpg?width=180&height=240&fit=bounds&auto=webp
最新消息：警方已经确认事发地点为得克萨斯州Lufkin一家沃尔玛超市，案发时间应为6月28日上午11点。警方相信已经确认该女子身份，正在准备逮捕令相关手续。
该女子将可能被控以二级重罪：污染食物（TAMPERING WITH A CONSUMER PRODUCT），该罪将被判处2-20年监禁，外加至高10000美元罚金。
恭喜发财

free切:
居然是美女子而不是美女。简直是一股清流

—— 来自 HUAWEI LYA-AL10, Android 9上的 S1Next-鹅版 v2.1.0

Samsong:

黑猩猩队长

solaris16661:
97年附近，我自己在家帮家里的雪糕摊卖东西的同时，就见过这种人，拿出雪糕，没给钱，撕开包装，舔了一口，来了一句不好吃，然后就放回去了，鉴于环境特殊(医院)，只能将雪糕作为医疗废弃物丢弃

wap:
